mainEntity.name: What is the purpose of the Purple (or Pink) Screen?

acceptedAnswer.text: It displays a soft purple or pink color, used for calming visuals, background light, or aesthetic effects.

mainEntity.name: Can I use it for lighting or mood setting?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, many users use the purple or pink screen to create ambient lighting for rooms or photography.

mainEntity.name: Does it work on phones and tablets?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. It's mobile-friendly and adjusts automatically to your screen size.

mainEntity.name: Is it safe for long use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, but like all bright screens, take occasional breaks to rest your eyes.
